name: Sudheer Singh
description:
First generation entrepreneur, Sudheer Singh is the Founder and
                                        CEO of RKTect Constructions Pvt. Ltd., a professionally managed organization
                                        providing Construction Management & Supervision . A young student of Civil
                                        Engineering turned entrepreneur. Prior to this Sudheer has associated with
                                        CRRI-New Delhi for 5 years.
                                        He started his career as a Civil Engineer at L&T Pvt. Ltd., where he worked
                                        for 2 years. He is committed to provide quality and economic efficient
                                        services to build a healthy and environmentally survival constructions to
                                        the clients, he has also worked as project executive for U.S.F.D.A Building
                                        & Facilities at Mankind Pharma Ltd.(Himachal Pradesh) for 1 year. Sudheer
                                        has a Masterâ€™s in Structural Engineering from Vivekanand University,
                                        Kolkata. He has completed his graduation from UPTU, Lucknow with a degree in
                                        Bachelor of Technology (Civil Engineering)

name: Man Mohan Singh
description:
Marketing icon Mr Man Mohan Singh is having vast experience in
                                        the field of marketing and Mechanical engineering.He has good experience of
                                        market analysis and reporting.

                                        He has been in association with GOURANGA MARKETING PVT LTD, NEW DELHI as
                                        Operations Manager.

                                        Prior to that he has served as key member of PAY2LIFE ,Noida.He is having
                                        expertise in Managing, training and motivating s team to drive revenue
                                        growth.
                                        Mr.Man Mohan has done Graduation in Mechanical engineering from
                                        UPTU,Lucknow.

name: Er. Harishankar
description: Perform engineering duties in planning, designing, and overseeing construction and maintenance of Highway structures, and facilities, such as roads, railroads, airports, bridges, harbors, channels, dams, irrigation projects, pipelines, power plants, and water and sewage systems.
